feedback: The resume demonstrates strong skills in Python and Machine Learning frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow.
Experience in AI/ML fits well, but lacks direct exposure to RAG pipelines or knowledge graph integration.
Education aligns well, holding a Bachelor's in Technology as required.
Certification section is empty; adding industry-relevant ones could improve score.
Language and communication are strong, reflecting professional presentation and relevancy.
Resume formatting is polished, aiding readability and professional appearance.
